author: Special Correspondent
text:
Many roadside vendors have set up shops in front of public parks in the city selling salads in small cups and tender coconut, which are priced between Rs. 30 and Rs. 50.

Near Rajaji Park and Corporation swimming pool, vendors sell lime juice topped with soda (goli soda) with a pinch of salt for Rs. 10 or Rs. 15 a glass.

On the city outskirts, roadside vendors sell ‘nungu’ (ice apple or palm fruit) and ‘pathaneer’ (palm nectar).

‘Koozh’ and soup

Near Race Course and Vandiyur Park, ‘kammankoozh’ and soups made of boiled vegetables are sold.
title: Go for these coolers
